total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the positions of the number 8 in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the positions of the number 4 in the input grid.
Q3: Determine the pattern of the number 8 in relation to the number 4 in the input grid.
Q4: Based on the pattern identified in Q3, create a new grid with the number 8.
Q5: Determine the size of the output grid based on the positions of the number 8 and the number 4 in the input grid.
Q6: Fill the output grid with the number 8 according to the pattern identified in Q3 and the size determined in Q5.
